title: New Images From SHAZAM!
body:
New Images From SHAZAM!

Entertainment Weekly has the Big Red Cheese himself on the cover on the cover of their Comic-Co issue as well as a photo Shazam (Zachary Levi) with his pal Freddy Freeman (Jack Dylan Grazer).


“It’s complete wish-fulfillment — if you scour all of DC and Marvel there are very few characters that are actually stoked to be a superhero,” Zachary Levi enthuses. “They’re not brooding, they’re not put…

blog.name: fuckyeahx-23
blog.title: Target X
blog.description:
X-23 is the product of a top-secret project that attempted to recreate the original Weapon X. Cloned from a damaged DNA sample of Wolverine, X-23 was programmed to be the perfect killing machine.

She goes by Laura Kinney, a name given to her by her genetic creator/surrogate mother, Sarah Kinney.

Her official X-Men codename - before Wolverine - was Talon.

X-23 was created by Craig Kyle and Chris Yost, and first appeared on X-Men: Evolution.

If we post your art and you want it credited differently/taken down, please message us.

NSFW tags: #seX-23 and #sniktcest

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: The world has fallen to a monstrous infection, those who remain must band together to survive.  In Upstate New York, heroes and...
caption:
The world has fallen to a monstrous infection, those who remain must band together to survive.  In Upstate New York, heroes and civilians alike are working to build a life, even in the wake of civilisation crumbling.

Marvel Zombies RP open character: Carol Danvers

Moderator suggestion for this character:

Carol flew to Earth when the Alpha Flight Aerolith was initiating lockdown procedures, determined to assist the Avengers rather than hide in the safety of space.

Survivors connected to Carol:

  • Raven Darkholme • Mystique
  • Jessica Drew • Spider-Woman
  • Wanda Maximoff • The Scarlet Witch
  • Natasha Romanoff • Black Widow
  • Tony Stark • Iron Man
  • Anna Marie • Rogue

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

summary: Marvel Rising: Initiation Official Trailer Streamed
title: Marvel Rising: Initiation Official Trailer Streamed
body:
The official Marvel Rising Facebook page has updated with a new trailer for the upcoming series of shorts. The latest trailer features a look at some of the main characters. All six shorts will premiere on Disney XD under the name, “Marvel Rising: Initiation,“on August 13th. The shorts will lead into the animated film titled, “Marvel Rising: Secret Warriors,” which will premiere on the Disney…

blog.name: everything---but
blog.title: What Could Be Greater Than A King?
blog.description: Come one come all to my blog filled with everything I like and nothing I don't. Comics, Anime, and Videogames. It's DC over Marvel any day even tho I do enjoy the MCU. Batman v Superman is a masterpiece. Batman and the Bat Family are the coolest. I try to keep y'all posted with the latest news in comic book related shows and movies animated or live action so give me a follow. Enjoy.

summary: I’m so worried about Cap’s movie
title: I’m so worried about Cap’s movie
body: I don’t just want it to be entertaining, you know? I want it to DO something the way Black Panther, Thor: Ragnarok, and Wonder Woman felt like they were Really Fucking Special. She’s such an amazing character, with so many layers…

reblog.comment: I don’t just want it to be entertaining, you know? I want it to DO something the way Black Panther, Thor: Ragnarok, and Wonder Woman felt like they were Really Fucking Special. She’s such an amazing character, with so many layers…

trail.content_raw: I don’t just want it to be entertaining, you know? I want it to DO something the way Black Panther, Thor: Ragnarok, and Wonder Woman felt like they were Really Fucking Special. She’s such an amazing character, with so many layers…
trail.content: I don’t just want it to be entertaining, you know? I want it to DO something the way Black Panther, Thor: Ragnarok, and Wonder Woman felt like they were Really Fucking Special. She’s such an amazing character, with so many layers…
